Patients.ChiefComplaint: Patient complains of fatigue for the past 2 months.
Patients.DetailedSymptoms: Persistent tiredness or exhaustion even after rest or sleep. Lack of energy for daily activities. Mental fatigue: difficulty concentrating, poor memory, feeling “foggy”. Physical fatigue: weakness, heaviness in limbs, slower movements
